article_title: Thomas Cook to Rent Airbus Military Refueling Plane
article_text:
The AirTanker consortium that includes Airbus Group NV has signed up its first commercial customer for A330 refueling planes used by the U.K. military, as Thomas Cook Group PLC Tuesday said it plans to rent one of the jets for trans-Atlantic flights.

Thomas Cook Airlines will operate the A330 from May on routes linking Glasgow, Scotland, Manchester, England and London Stansted with Las Vegas, Orlando and Cancún, the U.K. tour...
